import math

def main():
    x = float(input())
    print(int(math.ceil(x * 1000 * (5280 / 4854)) + 1))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    x = float(input())
    print(int(round(1000 * (5280/4854) * x)), "meters")

main()
